SELECT DISTINCT
FROM tb_ml3_permission a LEFT JOIN tb_ml3_permission p ON p.id = a.parent_id JOIN tb_ml3_role_permission rm ON rm.permission_id = a.id JOIN tb_ml3_role r ON r.id = rm.role_id AND r.useable='1' JOIN tb_ml3_agent_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.id JOIN tb_ml3_agent u ON u.id = ur.agent_id AND u.id = #{userId} WHERE a.del_flag = 0 AND r.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY a.sort
